definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: And have you ever seen anyone actually clean the watercooler?
sentences.chinese: 而且你看見誰清理過飲水機的？

sentences.english: Water-cooler disruptions can be annoying but they can also be creative.
sentences.chinese: 飲水機旁的干擾或許令人討厭但也可能激發創意。

sentences.english: Sometimes, they will come in to collect water to drink from the drinking machine.
sentences.chinese: 有時，他們會進來從飲水機裏接水喝。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the germicidal efficacy of ultraviolet rays in water dispenser.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察紫外線在直飲水機中的殺菌效果。

sentences.english: It's the morning following a nightly build and everyone's standing around the water cooler.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個晚上鏖戰後的早晨，大家都站在飲水機邊上。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a valve, particularly a gas filtering one-way valve for the water inlet pipe of a drinking water machine.
sentences.chinese: 一種閥門，特別涉及一種飲水機進水管的濾氣單向閥。

sentences.english: Please drink this water which has been produced with reverse osmosis.
sentences.chinese: 逆滲透飲水機，水質衛生可靠，敬請安心飲用。

sentences.english: Good evening everyone. Today, I will introduce how to operate a drinking fountain.
sentences.chinese: 那麼要稍等一會，等飲水機的熱水熱好。

sentences.english: Have fluids on you rather than depending on water fountains.
sentences.chinese: 讓身體保持水分充足是比依靠飲水機更好的方法。

sentences.english: A trip back to the water cooler should illustrate my point nicely.
sentences.chinese: 再次回到飲水機邊上，可以更好地闡明我的觀點。

definition: cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
